name: CloudZoo Issuer Example
description: A starting point for a third-party Cloud Zoo issuer

ISSUER_ID.description: You should have received this from McNeel (see https://www.rhino3d.com/go/cloudzoo/register-issuer).

ISSUER_SECRET.description: You should have received this from McNeel (see https://www.rhino3d.com/go/cloudzoo/register-issuer).

ISSUER_SUPPORT_URL.description: The URL that customers should go to for support.
